languages.text: "Лорд-инквизитор передавал Вашей Светлости рекомендации не интересоваться этим вопросом". {n}Хамские слова произнесены безукоризненно вежливым тоном.{/n}
"I was instructed to tell Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship that the Lord Inquisitor advises against making that enquiry." {n}The outrageously rude words are spoken in an impeccably polite tone.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Лорд-инквизитор передавал Вашей Светлости рекомендации не интересоваться этим вопросом". {n}Хамские слова произнесены безукоризненно вежливым тоном.{/n}

languages.text: “我奉命告诉大人您，大审判官大人建议您不要询问此事。”{n}他以无懈可击的礼貌语气，说出了这些粗鲁得令人发指的话。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was instructed to tell Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship that the Lord Inquisitor advises against making that enquiry." {n}The outrageously rude words are spoken in an impeccably polite tone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我奉命告诉大人您，审判长大人建议您不要询问此事。”{n}他以无懈可击的礼貌语气，说出了这些粗鲁得令人发指的话。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: 「ロード・インクィジターは、陛下がそのようなお尋ねをなさらないよう忠告せよと、仰っていました」{n}召使は非道に無礼な言葉を、驚くほど礼儀正しい響きで発した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was instructed to tell Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship that the Lord Inquisitor advises against making that enquiry." {n}The outrageously rude words are spoken in an impeccably polite tone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・インクィジターは、陛下がそのようなお尋ねをなさらないよう忠告せよと、仰っていました」{n}召使は非道に無礼な言葉を、驚くほど礼儀正しい響きで発した。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: «Se me ordenó decirle a mi{mf|lord|lady} que el Lord Inquisidor desaconseja hacer esa investigación». {n}Las palabras groseras las dice en un tono impecablemente educado.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was instructed to tell Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship that the Lord Inquisitor advises against making that enquiry." {n}The outrageously rude words are spoken in an impeccably polite tone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Se me ordenó decirle a mi{mf|lord|lady} que el Lord Inquisidor desaconseja hacer esa investigación». {n}Las palabras groseras las dice en un tono impecablemente educado.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: "Ich soll Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ausrichten, dass der Großinquisitor davon abrät, diese Frage zu stellen." {n}Die unerhört unhöflichen Worte werden in makellos höflichem Ton vorgetragen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was instructed to tell Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship that the Lord Inquisitor advises against making that enquiry." {n}The outrageously rude words are spoken in an impeccably polite tone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich soll Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ausrichten, dass der Großinquisitor davon abrät, diese Frage zu stellen." {n}Die unerhört unhöflichen Worte werden in makellos höflichem Ton vorgetragen.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: « J'ai reçu comme instruction de dire à Votre Seigneurie que le seigneur inquisiteur vous déconseille vivement de chercher à en savoir plus. » {n}Malgré l'impertinence de sa réponse, le ton du serviteur reste des plus polis.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was instructed to tell Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship that the Lord Inquisitor advises against making that enquiry." {n}The outrageously rude words are spoken in an impeccably polite tone.{/n}

traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: "Lord Engizisyoncu, bu suali sormamanız yönünde tavsiyede bulunmuştu {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri." {n}Hizmetkârın ağzından çıkan müthiş kabalıkta sözler, kusursuz nezaketiyle buluşuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was instructed to tell Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship that the Lord Inquisitor advises against making that enquiry." {n}The outrageously rude words are spoken in an impeccably polite tone.{/n}
